channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Content Navigator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Content Navigator

item.title: CVE-2022-43581|2024-08-03T13:32:59.823Z -- ibm -- content%20navigator
item.description: IBM Content Navigator 3.0.0, 3.0.1, 3.0.2, 3.0.3, 3.0.4, 3.0.5, 3.0.6, 3.0.7, 3.0.8, 3.0.9, 3.0.10, 3.0.11, and 3.0.12 is vulnerable to missing authorization and could allow an authenticated user to load external plugins and execute code. IBM X-Force ID: 238805.

item.title: CVE-2021-20550|2024-08-03T17:45:44.304Z -- ibm -- content%20navigator
item.description: IBM Content Navigator 3.0.CD is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 199168.

item.title: CVE-2021-20549|2024-08-03T17:45:44.407Z -- ibm -- content%20navigator
item.description: IBM Content Navigator 3.0.CD is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 199167.

item.title: CVE-2021-20448|2024-08-03T17:37:24.334Z -- ibm -- content%20navigator
item.description: IBM Content Navigator 3.0.CD is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 196624.
